title: IMPLEMENT USER AUTHENTICATION SYSTEM
description: Build comprehensive auth flow with JWT tokens, password hashing, and session management. Include password reset functionality and email verification.

title: OPTIMIZE DATABASE QUERY PERFORMANCE
description: Analyze slow queries and implement indexing strategies. Focus on user table joins and search functionality bottlenecks.

title: DESIGN MOBILE RESPONSIVE LAYOUT
description: Create adaptive layouts for tablet and mobile breakpoints. Ensure touch-friendly interactions and optimized loading performance.

title: CONDUCT SECURITY AUDIT
description: Perform comprehensive security review including XSS protection, CSRF tokens, and API endpoint validation. Generate detailed report.

title: UPDATE PROJECT DOCUMENTATION
description: Revise API documentation, deployment guides, and onboarding materials. Include code examples and troubleshooting sections.
